trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AnchorChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.CargoChanged"></xref> events.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs> data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> that raised the event, the anchor or cargo resource associated with the event, and the action that was taken - <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction,System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResource)"></xref> class.
The annotation that raised the event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos"></xref> resource of the event.
Gets the action of the annotation <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventArgs.Resource"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationResourceChangedEventHandler> is called when an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> resource is <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed>, or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> that raised the event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos"></xref> resource associated with the event.

The annotation anchor or cargo resource that was <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Added"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Removed"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationAction.Modified"></xref>.
